      • determineCostOfEntry

        public static double determineCostOfEntry(HealthRecord.Entry entry,
                                          Person person)
        Return the cost of the given entry (Encounter/Procedure/Immunization/Medication).
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to calculate the cost for.
        person - the person associated with the entry.
        Returns:
        the total cost of the entry.

      • loadCostData

        public static void loadCostData()
        Load all cost data needed by the system.

      • hasCost

        public static boolean hasCost(HealthRecord.Entry entry)
        Whether or not this HealthRecord.Entry has an associated cost on a claim. Billing cost is not necessarily reimbursed cost or paid cost.
        Parameters:
        entry - HealthRecord.Entry
        Returns:
        true if the entry has a cost; false otherwise

      • hasSpecifiedCost

        public static boolean hasSpecifiedCost(java.lang.String code)
        Returns Whether or not this code has an ossociated specified cost in one of the cost CSVs.
        Parameters:
        code - String
        Returns:
        true if the code has a specified cost; false otherwise
